sentences.en: Bugs scrunch so well under foot.
sentences.cn: 虫子在脚下嘎吱作响的感觉真好.

sentences.en: Her feet scrunch on the gravel.
sentences.cn: 她的脚喀嚓喀嚓地踩在沙砾上。

sentences.en: I scrunch up my nose at the sight of ( table ) scrap in the garbage.
sentences.cn: 残羹 剩菜使我掩鼻.

sentences.en: Just roll and scrunch the sleeves cutaway blazer ( Elizabeth and James , $ 395 ) and you're set.
sentences.cn: 只是把这件上衣的袖子卷起来 ( 395美元 ).

trans.tran_cn: 压，挤压，扭曲（面部），把…揉成小团
